body.p: If the latest MSXML 4.0 service pack is not installed on your computer, you are likely to encounter the following error message in the Results panel when you run a transformation scenario that uses the MSXML 4.0 transformer.

example.title: Error Message
example.codeblock: Could not create the 'MSXML2.DOMDocument.4.0' object. Make sure that MSXML version 4.0 is correctly installed on the machine.

body.p: To fix this issue, go to the Microsoft website and get the latest MSXML 4.0 service pack.
